about_the_game:
They will tell you it doesn't exist, that this place is just the creation of some lunatic's imagination. But it's all true. Hangar 68 is out there! You can believe it... and you can race in it! Get captured by the mysterious allure of a secret military base housing a real unidentified flying object. And much more!

Uncover all the mysteries concealed within the Alien Encounters Expansion Pack: a mega hangar spanning 3 levels where you can race through the wreckage of a UFO. Speed through suspended walkways, and ventilation systems, explore rooms and laboratories filled with surprises, and experience close encounters with out-of-this-world fun!

Experience all of these while aboard “well-identified road objects” like the Hiway Hauler™ 2, a powerful compact truck; Test Subject™, a monster truck ready for any challenge; Speed Slayer™, the embodiment of speed in a vehicle; and Swamp Buggy, with its unconventional look for racing on any terrain.

We may not yet know if there's life in the universe, but one thing's for sure: there's plenty of fun in Hangar 68!

This DLC includes:
  • 1 Environment to build your tracks: Hangar 68
  • 4 Vehicles: Hiway Hauler™ 2, Test Subject™, Speed Slayer™, Swamp Buggy
  • 1 new area to add to the Hot Wheels™ Creature Rampage mode
  • Background, Profile icon, Tag and Card Background to further customize your Unleashed Profile!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED™ 2 - Season Pass Vol. 2.

short_description: Step into Hangar 68 and uncover all the mysteries hidden within the rooms and laboratories of this secret military base. Get ready to have close encounters with out-of-this-world fun!
